name: Into The Dark (itch) (Bigdad1630)
description:
Into The Dark was developed in under 24-hours for the FlameGamesJam 2020. The jam theme was "Death". To include the theme, I decided to go with a Limbo art style with an atmospheric surrounding. In the end, you will always be met with death.

NOTE: Art and Music were found on OpenGameArt. All credits can be found in the Credit section of the game.
